file_content.text: May Darth Zash tremble in your presence.
Goodbye, Lord Khreusis, and thank you for the artifact.
Aagh!
So you're not all talk after all. Darth Zash should be very proud, and very afraid.
The mask is just an old trinket, but if you really think it'll help you defeat her, take it.
Thank you.
Good luck defeating your master.
I won't fail.
Don't worry.
See that you don't. I'd hate to have wasted such an artifact on failure.
See, now that wasn't so hard, was it?
Finally.
Arrogance does not win you any favors.
And here I thought the Sith were above petty burglary. I wonder what your master would think if she knew you were breaking and entering.
Or did she by chance send you on this little errand?
This is my own doing.
Zash didn't send me.
So I thought.
Your mask. Zash wants it.
Of course she did.
Zash has her own toys. What need could she have of mine?
It's really not your business.
I'm not telling.
It's my compound, it's my business.
Your master and I hardly see eye to eye, but this isn't her style. Too much risk of getting caught. Too little reward.
It has all the marks of an apprentice. When Darth Thanaton learns of this, you will be punished.
What if I told you that I believe Zash intends to betray me, and that I need your mask to defeat her?
Help me oppose Zash.
Already planning to kill your master, hm. Much as I'd like to see her dead, I don't think you'll be the one.
I've killed more powerful Sith than her.
I killed Skotia.
I assume you're referring to Darth Skotia. Trickery. Of Zash's devising, no doubt. I don't think she'll be so forthcoming about her own weaknesses.
But just for my own amusement, let's see these skills of yours.
I've defeated all your guards so far. What else do I need to do to prove myself to you?
I'm more than I seem.
You want to prove yourself? Alright. This could be amusing.
Seran, Vassek. Give Zash's apprentice a proper test.
If you won't give me the mask, I'll have to kill you.
Don't make me murder you.
That mask is mine by right of inheritance.
I just want what's mine.
A Twi'lek slave! Heir to a Sith artifact!
A Zabrak criminal! Heir to a Sith artifact!
Don't be ridiculous. You're a slave. Still are.
The only thing you'll inherit is a slave collar.
Who is going to tell him once you're dead?
He won't find out.
You do talk big, don't you? Go on then. Let's see what you've got.
